summary: This folder implements the core artifact resolution engine for the WarpData ecosystem, enabling efficient access to sharded data. It provides a sophisticated layer that maps abstract artifact references to physical bytes using Parquet-based indices, supporting local, S3, and HTTP storage backends with integrated caching and hybrid-mode auto-downloading.
responsibilities: Resolving abstract artifact references to physical byte streams across multiple storage backends.
Managing O(1) lookups for tar members using Parquet-backed indices.
Implementing 'hybrid' and 'strict' data access modes for automatic local caching of remote shards.
Handling URI resolution for local://, file://, s3://, and http(s):// schemes.
Providing fallback mechanisms for scanning tar archives when indices are missing.
Managing atomic downloads and progress reporting for remote data shards.
